welcome_message_body: Welcome to Racine, where the picturesque lakeshore meets vibrant downtown charm. Known for its rich history, stunning architecture, and world-famous kringle, we invite you to explore and savor all that our city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Bendtsen's Bakery
restaurants.description: Bendtsen's Bakery is a bakery located in Racine.

restaurants.name: Bernie's Pizzeria

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kenosha Regional Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including restaurants, shops, and rental car services.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at General Mitchell International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C primarily serves domestic airlines and offers a variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: International Terminal
terminals.description: The International Terminal at General Mitchell International Airport serves international flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lawrence J Timmerman Airport serves all commercial flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Lawrence J Timmerman Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Memorial Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Memorial Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
